original_text: and who through the Spirit of holiness was appointed the Son of God in power by his resurrection from the dead: Jesus Christ our Lord.
korean_text: 성결의 영으로는 죽은 자들 가운데서 부활하사 능력으로 하나님의 아들로 선포되셨으니 곧 우리 주 예수 그리스도시니라

sentences.original_text: and who through the Spirit of holiness
was appointed Son of God in power
by his resurrection from the dead
